channel.title: Crowdfunding on Data Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Crowdfunding on Data Analytics

item.title: Estimating welfare of borrowers by analysing Kiva dataset - part I
item.description: Kiva is an online lending platform connecting online lenders to entrepreneurs across the globe. Kiva’s mission is to connect people through lending to alleviate poverty. Kiva relies on a network of field partners to administer the loans on the ground. These field partners can be microfinance institutions, social businesses, schools or non-profit organizations. Kiva does not collect any interest on the loans it facilitates and is supported by grants, loans, and donations from the platform’s users.
